content: Condominium Investments Property Asked by Guo Hao TeoAsked on 31 Jul 2019Anyone bought a 1 bed room condominium and rented out for income can share your experience?How is the tenant profile like? Is it easy to get tenants? Is the rental income sustainable?2 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 13 Aug 2019I've had a tenant (my first) who either didn't pay on time (he usually paid 1 month late), and in general was not contactable. That was a nightmare tenant.Thankfully, my second tenant(s) are a really nice couple!With regards to ease of getting tenants, it really depends on the area you are in. The key is in ensuring a high occupancy rate ie. don't leave the unit empty for too long.0 comments1
